ogTitle: test article pres. trump says he'll lift economic sanctions on turkey after the country agreed to a permanent ceasefire in northern syria. - smarther news
ogDescription: let someone else fight over this long-bloodstained sand.
quote: Let someone else fight over this long-bloodstained sand.
summary: Test Article Pres. Trump says he’ll lift economic sanctions on Turkey after the country agreed to a permanent ceasefire in northern Syria.
body:
• On Tuesday, Turkey & Russia agreed to patrol the Syria-Turkey border amid escalating violence in the region.
  • In response, Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-SC) said “Russia, Turkey and Syria cannot patrol this area – that’s a death blow to the Kurds.
  • The Kurds, an ethnic minority, fought with the United States to defeat ISIS.

Remarks by President Trump on the Situation in Northern Syria
https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefings-statements/remarks-president-trump-situation-northern-syria/
